trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around January 31st 2003
Summary: Filmed very large metalic object on fire falling from sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm not sure what it is, but I have it on 8mm film. I just found the old film yesterday while cleaning my garage. It's a huge round object completely on fire falling from sky at high altitude. I'm guessing it would have hit the in Nevada mountains unless it made it over the mountains. I have very good 30 seconds or so footage with some zoom in close up.. I don't know how to put the video on my laptop but I can hook the camcorder up to my TV..
